Just go to HelixSleep.com/Dixie, take their two-minute sleep quiz, and theyâ€™ll match you to a customized mattress that will give you the best sleep of your life.Â 

Special Offer: right now, Helix is offering up to $200 off all mattress orders AND two free pillows to listeners of the Bawdy Storytelling podcast. Thatâ€™s HelixSleep.com/Dixie for up to 200 dollars off and two free pillows!

Â 

Like A Kitten: Has your sex fallen into the same old, dull routine? Break those boring habits with a fun sexy box from Like A Kitten. This month theyâ€™re helping you choose your own adventure with their BYOB box. A.K.A., Build Your Own Box! You get to choose one item out of each of their 6 categories: Toys, Beauty Products, Lubes and Cleansers, Games, Sexy Accessories, and Lingerie. Within each category, you have 8 or more products you can choose from, so you can customize your kit. The box only costs $69, and some of the vibrators alone retail for more than that. & Right now, Like A Kitten is offering our listeners 20% off AND free shipping when you go to https://likeakitten.com/Dixie And/or enter the code Dixie at checkout. And I love that that a portion of all sales goes to charities that focus on womenâ€™s empowerment, education, and health. So, you can feel good about feelinâ€™ good!

Patreon: Become a member of our Patreon community & You can get free livestream tickets, get access to all the livestream replays, be connected to other Bawdy fans, and so much more. Sign up for The Hookup ($10/month) or higher means that you receive free tickets to special events, Free tickets to our Livestream shows, access to the livestream replay, ad-free episodes of the podcast & more. Our Patreon has new patron tiers like the Confidante, the Concierge & more. Our Patrons have kept Bawdy going during COVID and as we struggle with re-entry, weâ€™re saying Thank you to all of you with Insider Info and exclusive access. (& Thank You in advance!)

Want the perfect gift for your favorite Bawdy podcast fan? Dixie has created her own fragrance: Youâ€™ll love #BawdyGotMeLaid perfume, scented with amber, ylang ylang, warm vanilla and golden honey. Thereâ€™s also our (scented or unscented) creamy Bawdy Butter, Hair & Bawdy Oil, & more. Bawdy Merchandise means you can deliver your own great smelling Motorboats while supporting Dixie and Bawdy. Get yours today at https://bawdystorytelling.com/merchandise

Cameo/Custom Dixie video: Need the perfect gift? Iâ€™ve been having so much fun making customized videos for you! Send your friends and lovers a custom â€˜Cameoâ€™ video from Dixie (with or without applause tiddies), itâ€™s a great way to send love from far away to a Bawdy fanâ€¦ For just $69, you and I can have a short zoom call, you can tell me all about the recipient, and Iâ€™ll make a custom video from you for their special day. Find out more by emailing dixie@BawdyStorytelling.com #CustomVideo #Gift

Â 

Ready to tell your story, and change your life? Iâ€™m now offering Storytelling for Self-Discovery to help you customize your stories. Anxious about navigating whatâ€™s next? Are you writing a book, or working on your brand storytelling for your business?Â  No matter what youâ€™re up against, I can help you communicate with calmness & clarity - and Iâ€™d love to help you find your story. Email me at dixie@BawdyStorytelling.com for more info - we can book a short discovery call, and Iâ€™m happy to answer any questions.

Â 

Check out our Bawdy Storytelling Fiends and Fans group on Facebook - itâ€™s a place to discuss the podcastâ€™s stories with the storytellers, share thoughts with your fellow listeners, & help Dixie make the podcast even better. Just answer 3 simple questions and youâ€™re IN! https://www.facebook.com/groups/360169851578316/

Subscribe to our email list & youâ€™ll be notified of all upcoming Livestreams, Podcasts and Special Events first - itâ€™s atÂ 

https://bawdystorytelling.com/subscribe

Â 

Thank you to the Team that makes this podcast possible

Â 

Team Bawdy is:

Sound Engineer: David Grosof
Archivist / Video: Joe Moore

Storytelling support by Mosa Maxwell-Smith

& Bawdy Creator & Podcast Host Dixie De La Tour

& Thank you to Pleasure Podcasts. Bawdy Storytelling is proud to be part of your sex-positive podcast collective!Â
